Condition.Diagnostic: When TIM1/TIM15 derives from PLLQ, they can be only an integer multiple of PCLK and must be aligned with it.
Condition.Expression: !(((PLLR2 & PLLQ2) |(PLLR3 & PLLQ3) | (PLLR4 & (PLLQ4 | PLLQ2)) | (PLLR5 & PLLQ5) | (PLLR6 & (PLLQ3 | PLLQ2 | PLLQ6)) | (PLLR7 & PLLQ7) | (PLLR8 & (PLLQ8 | PLLQ4 | PLLQ2))) & (SYSCLKFreq_VALUE1=SYSCLKFreq_VALUE2) & SysSourcePLL) & !STM32G0x0_Value_line

Condition.Diagnostic: When TIM1/TIM15 derives from PLLQ, they can be only an integer multiple of PCLK and must be aligned with it.
Condition.Expression: !(((PLLR2 & PLLQ2) |(PLLR3 & PLLQ3) | (PLLR4 & (PLLQ4 | PLLQ2)) | (PLLR5 & PLLQ5) | (PLLR6 & (PLLQ3 | PLLQ2 | PLLQ6)) | (PLLR7 & PLLQ7) | (PLLR8 & (PLLQ8 | PLLQ4 | PLLQ2))) & (SYSCLKFreq_VALUE1=SYSCLKFreq_VALUE2) & SysSourcePLL) & !STM32G0x0_Value_line

RefParameter.Name: EnbaleCSS
RefParameter.Comment: Clock Security System: available only when HSE is used directly or undirectly as System Clock

RefParameter.Comment: Clock Security System: available only when HSE is used directly or undirectly as System Clock

RefParameter.Comment: LSE Clock Security System: available only when LSE is used as Clock Source for RTC/LCD
